info.title: viceci
info.description:
Probably need to establish some concrete rules for less vagueness. Here's some I can think of:
* If your game crashes after finishing an objective it will still count as completed and you don't have to redo. * If your game crashes during an objective (eg. while collecting packages) you must start over. So if you collected 14 out of 20 packages, then crash, you must collect those 14 packages again, rather than just the remaining 6. (I think, people please confirm this rule) -- I agree * Also you aren't allowed to reset the game to do objectives you lock yourself out (like mhmd did to do Drive Misty for me with a dodo), unless you reset your whole bingo card.

bool.name: glitchonly
bool.description: This goal requires glitching the game to complete

goal.name: 2 chopper checkpoints
goal.description: Complete 2 different chopper checkpoint helicopter trials

goal.name: 3 chopper checkpoints
goal.description: Complete 3 different chopper checkpoint helicopter trials

goal.name: 4 chopper checkpoints
goal.description: Complete 4 different chopper checkpoint helicopter trials

goal.name: Test Track and Trial By Dirt
goal.description: Complete Test Track and Trial By Dirt

goal.name: Black Sanchez
goal.description: Acquire a black sanchez by doing Trial by Dirt 3 times

goal.name: Cone Crazy Any%
goal.description: Get a new Personal Best in Cone Crazy 9 times.

goal.name: 10 fares
goal.description: Do 10 fares in Taxi Driver. Duped fares count

goal.name: 33 fares
goal.description: Do 33 fares in Taxi Driver. Duped fares count

goal.name: 67 fares
goal.description: Do 67 fares in Taxi Driver. Duped fares count

goal.name: Sir Mass Murder Sir
goal.description: Kill all the soldiers before stealing the Tank on 'Sir Yes Sir'

goal.name: Chase the Plates
goal.description: Let the woman drive off and leave Vice Port before killing her and taking her plates on 'Hit the Courier'

goal.name: Mercedes VIP
goal.description: Drive Mercedes around North Point Mall in the Stretch's Back Seat during 'The Party'

goal.name: Classic%
goal.description: Don't take the taxi during 'Spilling The Beans', or when respawning at a hospital or police station

goal.name: Couple of Blocks
goal.description: Buy a Pistol in North Point Mall with Lance during 'Guardian Angels'

goal.name: Jury Fury Duty
goal.description: Do what Ken tells you to do and smash up the 'Jury Fury' cars with the hammer

goal.name: RIOT!
goal.description: Get the Spand Express uniform during 'Riot' and then kill all the rioters with your fists, or have them kill each other.

goal.name: Lap Dance
goal.description: Spend $300 on the Pole Position Lap Dance and complete the asset

goal.name: Shooting Range Fast Reload
goal.description: Get 45 points on the shooting range and earn the fast reload ability

goal.name: 3 street races
goal.description: Win 3 different streetraces from Sunshine Autos

goal.name: 4 street races
goal.description: Win 4 different streetraces from Sunshine Autos

goal.name: 6 street races
goal.description: Win all 6 different streetraces from Sunshine Autos

goal.name: No Pitstops allowed
goal.description: Finish all 6 different Sunshine Autos races in a single vehicle without repairing it during

goal.name: 1 import list
goal.description: Complete the first of the car import lists at Sunshine Autos

goal.name: 2 import lists
goal.description: Complete the second of the car import lists at Sunshine Autos

goal.name: 3 import lists
goal.description: Complete the third of the car import lists at Sunshine Autos

goal.name: 4 import lists
goal.description: Complete the fourth and last of the car import lists at Sunshine Autos

goal.name: Mini Super SSA
goal.description: Ram the lighthouse with all 4 reward cars from the Sunshine Autos import lists

goal.name: Chauvinist
goal.description: Put a Patriot in your garage

goal.name: Poacher
goal.description: Put a Rhino in your garage

goal.name: In with a bang
goal.description: Put a Bloodring Banger in your garage

goal.name: FBI Rancher's Barn
goal.description: Put an FBI Rancher in your garage

goal.name: Stretchy Candy
goal.description: Put Candy's Poop Colored Stretch in your garage

goal.name: Barracks OL
goal.description: Put a Barracks in your garage

goal.name: Tank Flipper
goal.description: Flip a tank so it explodes
have at least $500.000 at the end of the run

goal.name: Hike Lighthouse -> Prawn Island
goal.description: Go from the top of the lighthouse to the tennis court on Prawn Island without entering a vehicle

goal.name: Hike Prawn Island -> Lighthouse
goal.description: Go from the tennis court on Prawn Island to the top of the lighthouse without entering a vehicle

goal.name: Hike Airport -> Test Track
goal.description: Go from the southernmost end of the longest airport runway to the Test Track Landstalker without entering a vehicle

goal.name: Hike Test Track -> Airport
goal.description: Go from Test Track Landstalker to the southernmost end of the longest airport runway without entering a vehicle

goal.name: Lose 6 stars
goal.description: Lose a 6 star wanted level without loading a save, getting busted, or dying

goal.name: Bribe away 6 stars
goal.description: Lose a 6 star wanted level just by picking up cop bribes

goal.name: Bribe away 5 stars
goal.description: Lose a 5 star wanted level just by picking up cop bribes

goal.name: Bribe away 4 stars
goal.description: Lose a 4 star wanted level just by picking up cop bribes

goal.name: 6 Star Mission
goal.description: Do an entire mission that changes the savefile name with a 6* wanted level (must be acquired before starting the mission, and kept all the way until mission passed

goal.name: Never save
goal.description: No saving allowed, not even to advance time.

goal.name: Never load
goal.description: No loading the game allowed, but saving to advance time is fine.

goal.name: No Orange guns
goal.description: Don't use Assault rifles/weapons in the orange category. 'SUpply and Demand' and Rampages are excluded.

goal.name: No Yellow Guns
goal.description: Don't use Machine Guns/weapons in the yellow category. AKA. NO UZI! Includes drivebys. Rampages are excluded.

goal.name: No Helicopters
goal.description: Don't use Helicopters. 'Demolition Man', Chopper Checkpoint and RC Raider Pickup excluded.

goal.name: Mission Failer
goal.description: Every mission you start, if it changes the savefile name, must be failed at least once, at least once

goal.name: Classic controls
goal.description: Do 5 missions that change the savefile name using classic controls, to be enabled in the settings

goal.name: No reversing
goal.description: Do not put your vehicle in reverse

goal.name: No PCJ
goal.description: Driving the PCJ is prohibited (Except to do PCJ Playground)

goal.name: No parked vehicle spawns
goal.description: It is not allowed to take parked vehicles. Only vehicles that have previously had a driver during gameplay may be driven (this includes mission vehicles of which the driver got out, like Ken's white Admiral in the intro, or the sanchezes in Guardian Angels). Previously stolen vehicles may be entered again, and parked vehicles REQUIRED for mission progression (such as Lance's Infernus on Back Alley Brawl or the boat on The Fastest Boat, but not the Mall Shootout PCJs) are excepted. Includes vehicles for PCJ Playground etc, these must be stolen off the road first. (Except for Top Fun vans)

goal.name: Bloody Eggs
goal.description: Find a bathroom with blood all over and a chainsaw

goal.name: So Many Eggs
goal.description: Find Mikhail Gorbachev, a real Easter Egg, and a bathroom with blood all over

goal.name: Rrrrrrrrrradio Espantosooooo
goal.description: Stop movement and listen to entire 'La Vida Es Una Lenteija' on Radio Espantoso

goal.name: Rap Attack
goal.description: Stop movement and listen to entire 'Magic Wand' by Whodini on Wildstyle

goal.name: Can you tell me where my streamer has gone?
goal.description: Stop movement and listen to entire 'Japanese Boy' by Aneka on Flash FM

goal.name: 5 cutscenes
goal.description: Finish 5 missions that change the savefile name without skipping any of their cutscenes.

goal.name: Backstabber
goal.description: Kill Lance 3 times with a screwdriver

goal.name: Melee Master
goal.description: Kill someone with all 10 melee weapons in the game, as well as with the brass knuckles

goal.name: Boat Hopper
goal.description: Jump onto a moving boat, then from that boat onto another moving boat.

goal.name: Ugly car disposal
goal.description: Destroy the Infernus in North Point Mall without using weapons

goal.name: Malibu Murder
goal.description: Kill all dancers and guards in the Malibu including guards upstairs. (Police officers coming to hunt you down not required, except for the one on stage)

goal.name: Landstalker roll
goal.description: Do 10 rolls on the ground in a row with a Landstalker

goal.name: Get laid
goal.description: Get laid and have your health go to 125 (or 175 if pizzaboy has been passed)

goal.name: 25 Beachball bounces
goal.description: Do 25 bounces in a row with a beach ball

goal.name: Boatball
goal.description: Bounce a beachball on your head while standing on a boat

goal.name: 5 Beachball bounces on the beach
goal.description: Find a beachball on the beach, then bounce it on your head 5 times

goal.name: Firetruck Vs Caddy
goal.description: Smash into a driving golf cart headon with a firetruck

goal.name: Bus Driver
goal.description: Make 50 dollars by doing the bus driver minigame

goal.name: 2 seconds - 2 wheels
goal.description: Do a Two Wheels Double Bonus for 2 seconds

goal.name: Free Wheelie
goal.description: Get a wheelie award of at least 5 seconds with the Freeway or Angel

goal.name: It shone, pale as bone
goal.description: Change the size of the moon

goal.name: Admiral meets Mansion
goal.description: Drive Ken's White Admiral from the intro inside Diaz's/Tommy's mansion on Starfish Island

goal.name: Accuracy > 90%
goal.description: Have over 90% accuracy at the end of the run
In game percentage (truncated, as it appears in stats) must be evenly divisible by 5 at the end of the run

goal.name: Good Citizen
goal.description: Earn the Good Citizen / Nice Guy bonus

goal.name: Citizen of the Month
goal.description: Earn $500 total via Good Citizen / Nice Guy bonuses

goal.name: Not so Nice Guy
goal.description: Help a criminal on the run by eliminating the cop who is chasing him

goal.name: Power Saver
goal.description: Smash all the lamp posts on Links Bridge at least once
